mapper.sql: id, userCode, userName, userType, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, userPassword
mapper.insert: insert into backend_user (userCode, userName, userType, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate, userPassword) values (#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into backend_user
userCode,
userName,
userType,
createdBy,
creationDate,
modifyBy,
modifyDate,
userPassword,
#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update backend_user
userCode = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userType = #{userType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creationDate = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyBy = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
userPassword = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update backend_user set userCode = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userType = #{userType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createdBy = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creationDate = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyBy = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userPassword = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.userName,u.userType,u.creationDate,u.modifyBy,u.modifyDate,u.userPassword,d.`valueName` FROM `backend_user` u INNER JOIN `data_dictionary` d ON(d.`valueId`=u.userType AND d.`typeCode`='USER_TYPE') where userCode=#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and userPassword=#{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
